Subroutine vom_open_output

416 : 
417 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
418 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
419 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
420 : !*-----File opening (saving climate and gstom ass data)-----------------
421 : 
422 :       subroutine vom_open_output ()
423 :       use vegmod
424 :       use vegwatmod
425 :       implicit none
426 : 
427 :       open(kfile_resultshourly, status='replace',                      &
428 :      &     file=sfile_resultshourly(1:len_trim(sfile_resultshourly)))
429 :       write(kfile_resultshourly,'(a6,a7,a7,a7,a7,23a15)') 'year',      &
430 :      &  'month', 'day', 'dcum', 'hour', 'rain', 'tair', 'par', 'vd',   &
431 :      &  'esoil', 'pc', 'jmax25_t', 'jmax25_g', 'mq', 'rl', 'lambda_t', &
432 :      &  'lambda_g', 'rr', 'ass_t', 'ass_g', 'het_t', 'het_g', 'su_1',  &
433 :      &  'ys', 'Ws', 'spgfcf', 'infx'
434 : 
435 :       open(kfile_resultsdaily, status='replace',                       &
436 :      &     file=sfile_resultsdaily(1:len_trim(sfile_resultsdaily)))
437 :       write(kfile_resultsdaily,'(a6,a7,a7,a7,a7,25a15)') 'year',       &
438 :      &  'month', 'day', 'dcum', 'hour', 'rain', 'tmax', 'tmin', 'par', &
439 :      &  'vd', 'esoil', 'jmax25_t', 'jmax25_g', 'pc', 'rlt+rlg',        &
440 :      &  'lambda_t', 'lambda_g', 'rr_t', 'rr_g', 'ass_t', 'ass_g',      &
441 :      &  'su_avg', 'ys', 'ws', 'spgfcf', 'infx', 'etm_t', 'etm_g',      &
442 :      &  'su_1', 'topt'
443 : 
444 :       open(kfile_yearly, status='replace',                             &
445 :      &     file=sfile_yearly(1:len_trim(sfile_yearly)))
446 :       write(kfile_yearly,'(a6,19a16)') "year", "rainyr", "epanyr",     &
447 :      &  "paryr", "radyr", "vdyr", "esoilyr", "etyr", "etmgyr",         &
448 :    &  "assgyr", "rlgyr", "rrgyr", "cpccgyr", "tcgyr",                &
449 :    &  "etmtyr", "asstyr", "rltyr", "rrtyr", "cpcctyr", "tcyr"
450 : 
451 :       open(kfile_rsurfdaily, status='replace',                         &
452 :      &     file=sfile_rsurfdaily(1:len_trim(sfile_rsurfdaily)))
453 :       write(kfile_rsurfdaily,*) ' year', ' month', ' day', '   dcum',  &
454 :      &  '  rsurfsublayer'
455 : 
456 :       open(kfile_delyuhourly, status='replace',                         &
457 :      &     file=sfile_delyuhourly(1:len_trim(sfile_delyuhourly)))
458 :       write(kfile_delyuhourly,*) ' year', ' month', ' day', '   dcum',  &
459 :      &  ' hour', '  delyusublayer'
460 : 
461 :       open(kfile_ruptkhourly, status='replace',                        &
462 :      &     file=sfile_ruptkhourly(1:len_trim(sfile_ruptkhourly)))
463 :       write(kfile_ruptkhourly,*) ' year', ' month', ' day', '   dcum', &
464 :      &  ' hour', '  delyusublayer'
465 : 
466 :       open(kfile_suvechourly, status='replace',                        &
467 :      &     file=sfile_suvechourly(1:len_trim(sfile_suvechourly)))
468 :       write(kfile_suvechourly,*) ' year', ' month', ' day', '   dcum', &
469 :      &  ' hour', '  susublayer'
470 : 
471 :       return
472 :       end subroutine vom_open_output
